subject: RTSC Talk Radio --- (Tonight) at 9pm est (1 hr. away)
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Join us tonight as we welcome guest Dr. Salo Stanley to the program. Salo is
an avid ITC researcher as well as a chiropractor. The phone lines will be open
for calls and as usual an interactive chat.

Show is from 9pm-10pm est, so set the Tivo and DVR's for ghost Hunters.

Here is how to listen and chat:

http://www.stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html


To find out more on my guest, please check out her site:

http://www.salosounds.com/home.html


Hope to see everyone there,
-Steve H.
